What’s new ih the Xsense System

January 20 2021
  • Start Shipment on first reading.

    We added a check box to the start shipment popup - “Start On first reading”. This will save you from defining the exact time to start the shipment and leave it for the system to start it in the first reading time.

  • Mobile application now supports BLE data loggers.

    You can upload data to the Xsense system directly from our mobile app.

  • Dashboard - new widget to display cool store room or pre-cooling room with the data loggers showing current temperature and RH.

    This will give a clear view of current room temperature

  • The Xsense system now includes Cellular Data-logger, USB data-logger and BLE in addition to the RF data-loggers.

    For more information see www.xsense.co/dataloggers
